tool_description: Searches an entity from OFAC's Sanctions List with fuzzy logic on its name search field to look for potential matches on the Specially Designated Nationals (SDN) List and on its Non-SDN Consolidated Sanctions List.
title: OFAC Service

api_list.name: GET /data/entity/{uid}
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ofac-service.p.rapidapi.com/data/entity/{uid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ofac-service.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: POST /data/verify
api_list.description: Verifies an entity with matching threshold score.
api_list.code:
